feed.title: Improv Festivals
feed.subtitle: "Improv Festivals" is a site to list impro festivals all over the world.

entry.title: IFO Impro Fest
entry.content: The IFO Impro Fest ist one of Germany¬¥s biggest international festival with workshop, shows, party and a lot of improv fun!

entry.title: The REMIX Festival
entry.content:
Back for another year it‚Äôs the Reallygood Edinburgh Musical Improv eXtravaganza! Join us in Edinburgh üè¥Û†ÅßÛ†Å¢Û†Å≥Û†Å£Û†Å¥Û†Åø from 18-20th October for an incredible weekend of musical improv classes and performances.

All of the workshops, shows, and jams are included in simple weekend passes so there‚Äôs no FOMO and you‚Äôll get to make loads of new improv pals.

PS. If you don‚Äôt like singing don‚Äôt worry, you can do a complete weekend of non musical improv classes with our teachers- we won‚Äôt judge you!

entry.title: Birmingham Improv Festival 2024
entry.content: Birmingham‚Äôs Brilliant Biennial Improv Festival, bringing the best shows, teachers and improv fun to the UK‚Äôs Second City.
entry.summary: Birmingham‚Äôs Brilliant Biennial Improv Festival, bringing the best shows, teachers and improv fun to the UK‚Äôs Second City.

entry.title: Das Improv Festival
entry.content:
Berlin‚Äôs long-form improv festival! Featuring the best alternative improv from across Europe and North America, with an exciting slate of headline acts from around the world and top-notch workshops and intensives, plus all the best improv Berlin itself has to offer.

Sign up for our mailing list to get notified about Das news, including shows, ticket sales, workshops & more!
entry.summary: Berlin‚Äôs long-form improv festival! Featuring the best alternative improv from across Europe and North America, with an exciting slate of headline acts from around the world and top-notch workshops and intensives, plus all the best improv Berlin itself has to offer. Sign up for our mailing list to get notified about Das news, including shows, ticket sales, workshops & more!

entry.title: MOMENTA - Impro Theater Festival International
entry.content: Top-class international guests with innovative ideas and skills in improvisation, inspiring workshops, a hand-picked festival ensemble, shows, brand new improv formats, virtuosity and happenings - all this stands for a festival of special moments: MOMENTA!
entry.summary: Top-class international guests with innovative ideas and skills in improvisation, inspiring workshops, a hand-picked festival ensemble, shows, brand new improv formats, virtuosity and happenings - all this stands for a festival of special moments: MOMENTA!

entry.title: Improfestival Karlsruhe
entry.content:
After a smashing success in the last few years we are happy to be back in 2024 with even more shows and workshops.

This year we have a selection of:

  • 12 ensemble-members (10 actors, 1 musician and 1 technician)
  • A total of 9 days workshops, including one 3-day workshop with a showcase
  • And 18 completely different shows over 6 nights of performances

We are very excited to have a put together a program of very different improvised styles that are represented in unique shows and workshops but at the same time to keep the spirit of a ‚Äúcozy festival for friends‚Äù.

We are looking forward to having you back or welcoming you for a first time in Karlsruhe!

Follow us, get more info or book your tickets:

  • Facebook
  • Instagram
  • About the ensemble
  • Book your shows
  • Book your workshops
entry.summary: After a smashing success in the last few years we are happy to be back in 2024 with even more shows and workshops. This year we have a selection of: 12 ensemble-members (10 actors, 1 musician and 1 technician) A total of 9 days workshops, including one 3-day workshop with a showcase And 18 completely different shows over 6 nights of performances We are very excited to have a put together a program of very different improvised styles that are represented in unique shows and workshops but at the same time to keep the spirit of a ‚Äúcozy festival for friends‚Äù. We are looking forward to having you back or welcoming you for a first time in Karlsruhe! Follow us, get more info or book your tickets: Facebook Instagram About the ensemble Book your shows Book your workshops

entry.title: IRREVERENTE - International Impro Festival of Lisbon

link.title: IRREVERENTE - International Impro Festival of Lisbon

entry.content: The Festival intends to bring together the impro community living in Portugal with other countries, by promoting an event with activities in Theater, Dance, Music and other forms of art. In 2024 we introduce our Experimental Edition with the Theme: Impro and‚Ä¶
entry.summary: The Festival intends to bring together the impro community living in Portugal with other countries, by promoting an event with activities in Theater, Dance, Music and other forms of art. In 2024 we introduce our Experimental Edition with the Theme: Impro and‚Ä¶

entry.title: The Big Sing Musical Improv Festival

link.title: The Big Sing Musical Improv Festival

entry.content:
Welcome to the second edition of The Big Sing Musical Improv Festival! Join us for 4 jam-packed days of musical workshops, shows, and improv fun in beautiful Barcelona, Spain. The Big Sing Musical Improv Festival brings together amateur and professional improvisers and musicians to teach, share, learn, celebrate, and enjoy the hilarious and magical art of musical improv

Applications to perform with your group open February 1st-21st Workshop info & ticket sales to follow.

All details and updates will be posted at www.thebigsing.es
entry.summary: Welcome to the second edition of The Big Sing Musical Improv Festival! Join us for 4 jam-packed days of musical workshops, shows, and improv fun in beautiful Barcelona, Spain. The Big Sing Musical Improv Festival brings together amateur and professional improvisers and musicians to teach, share, learn, celebrate, and enjoy the hilarious and magical art of musical improv Applications to perform with your group open February 1st-21st Workshop info & ticket sales to follow. All details and updates will be posted at www.thebigsing.es

entry.title: Flock Festival
entry.content:
The international festival of Flock Theatre comes back with seven crazy days of improvised theatre, workshops, shows and more!

Stay tuned for more information on the line-up of fabulous international teachers and performers soon!
entry.summary: The international festival of Flock Theatre comes back with seven crazy days of improvised theatre, workshops, shows and more! Stay tuned for more information on the line-up of fabulous international teachers and performers soon!
